Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCDFPE01 WHERE IND_DEL= :IND_DEL ORDER BY FICHAE01CODI DESC
INSERT INTO CAM_ITCDFPE01 ( FICHAE01CODI, PROYCODI, COMENTARIOS, USU_CREACION, IND_DEL, FEC_CREACION ) VALUES ( :FICHAE01CODI, :PROYCODI, :COMENTARIOS, :USU_CREACION, :IND_DEL, :FEC_CREACION )
UPDATE CAM_ITCDFPE01 SET PROYCODI = :PROYCODI, COMENTARIOS = :COMENTARIOS, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, WHERE FICHAE01CODI = :FICHAE01CODI
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCDFPE01 ORDER BY FICHAE01CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
UPDATE CAM_ITCDFPE01 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL='0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_ITCDFPE01 WHERE PROYCODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
